name: Office Limbo
description:
There is no escape from here. Not for a loner.

But united, the two childs of this strange place will be able to make their way to freedom through bizarre corridors and halls.

You will meet:
Strange lobbies of a mysterious officeDeadly danger.
Puzzles on the way to the finish line.
Secrets that not everyone can reveal.
2 characters and Zero humanity.

Made by 2 characters with Zero humanity in seven days.

Assets used:

SyntyStudios - "POLYGON - Office Pack"

Kenney - "Game Icons"
